An ID verification helps us check that you are a real person and you are really you. It also helps us keep secure and trustworthy. How does it work?\n\nFirst you will add a picture of yourself and provide a clear picture of your ID. We will then quickly match both the pictures.

resources.string:
Users safety is our top priority. 
To create a secure environment for female users

Male users are required to complete ID verification before they can chat with female users.

This process helps us ensure that all male users are genuine, making your experience safer and more enjoyable.
Pay above UPI I\'d and upload screenshot
